EmailTemplate.name: Temporary RMA
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We are sorry to hear you are experiencing issues with your YETI Product!
We will be glad to get a replacement out soon. Please be on the look out for a second email with a pre-paid Fed Ex label to send back with your Product.
Regards,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeticoolers.com yeticoolers.com
